title: Posting Posts App
description: Serves as a website for users to post immediate reactions to their every-day experiences. Also allows users to post status messages as well as profile images.

title: Docu Appproximater
description: A novel NLP algorithm that approximates document age based on natural language processing concepts. Leverages Google Ngram Viewer by parsing for word usage data.

title: Class Forum App
description: A forum that serves as a Reddit-like application. Users are able to post, upvote/downvote, and reply to posts, enabling online conversation and discourse.

title: Voder - 2020 IvyHacks
description: Organizes and presents government API data with user-driven designs. Collects and provides factual info regarding 2020 presidential candidates.

title: 5-Card Poker
description: Play Poker versus 3 bots! GUI provides full functionality of a normal game of Poker (Betting, Matching, Discard/Replace, Hand Ranking). Player Chips are automatically recorded in BetHistory.txt after every round.

title: Find-A-Friend
description: An online application for user-matching. The service is made for students who feel lonely or are ucomfortable with their current situation. Matching is based on user discretion.

title: Campuswire Lite
description: The core functionality of Campuswire. This is a medium for students and professors to communicate with each other by posting and answering questions as well as receiving real-time updates.

title: Altrui Foundation
description: Acts as Altrui Foundation's prime form of media: providing News, Updates, Partnership, and Account features to empower the non-profit's chartiable endeavors.

title: Altrui Rx
description: A full-stack, automated medicine donation platform for pharmaceutical manufacturers and NGOs. Facilitated the transfer of $42 million worth of medication to disadvantaged communities.

title: Penn Mobile
description: The University of Pennsylvania's mobile application for students. Serves 8000+ users and provides students with on-the-go access to university dining, laundry, and study room bookings.
